channel.title: childrensbookradio
channel.description: Children's Book Podcast and Chilldren's Books bookstore. Childrensbookradio is podcast about children's books. This podcast is about children's books and literature. Sabrina Weissler will introduce you to new children's books each episode and interview children's book authors. Please check out our shownotes page, book guide, and children's book information at Childrensbookradio.com. We are the best podcast about Children's Literature. Send Feedback to support@teachtopia.com. This site is great for teachers, parents, students, children, and anyone interested in Children's literature. Glad that you enjoy Children's Books and this #1 Podcast.
channel.itunes:author: Jody Weissler
channel.itunes:subtitle: Childrensbookradio.com Childrens Book Podcast and Guide
channel.itunes:summary: Childrens Book Podcast and Guide. The first and longest running Childrens book podcast. Incredible author interviews and book reviews.

item.title: Childrensbookradio.com #10
item.description:
http://childrensbookradio.com In this Children's Book Podcast hosted by Sabrina Weissler.
For comments: email sabrina@teachtopia.com
For advertising: email sales@teachtopia.com
For this episode we are going to look at two books. The first book I am going to discuss is The Flea's sneeze by Lynn Downey and then I am going to share Bud Not Buddy by Christopher Paul Curtis.
The Flea's sneeze is at a more primary reading level while the Bud Not Buddy is at the upper elementary to beginning middle school level. But as usual with all the books we pick for discussion on childrensbookradio, this books will be enjoyed by anyone who appreciates children's books and literature.

item.title: Children's Book Guide, Podcast and Directory Childrensbookradio.com #38
item.description:
http://childrensbookradio.com Thanks for listening to the #1 Podcast and Guide About Children's Books called Childrensbookradio.com. With the resources of the Teachtopia.com education network we are striving to become the best resource on the internet for parents, children, and teachers for information about Children's books. (and Librarians!)
This episode is #38 of Childrensbookradio.com. We have an interview with and review of a few of the books of Kathi Appelt including The Underneath and Down Cut Shin Creek
We are very excited about the many authors and review we have lined up in the future, so make sure you bookmark http://childrensbookradio.com/
Also...don't forget to support (visit) our advertisers. We are a free resource thanks to our sponsors and affiliates.
Thanks for your continued support and please contact us via our website.

item.title: Children's Book Podcast and Guide Childrensbookradio.com #39
item.description:
http://childrensbookradio.com We are glad that you enjoy our podcast about Children's Books. Childrensbookradio.com is your source for great author interviews, reviews, and information about the world of Children's Books and Literature.

Please visit Childrensbookradio.com for an archive of all past shows, as well as a bookstore featuring all featured books.
Also visit Childrensbookradio.com to contact us

item.title: Children's Book Podcast and Children's Book Store Childrensbookradio.com #40
item.description:
http://childrensbookradio.com The Childrensbookradio.com children's book guide directory is proud to present an interview with Kimberly Willis Holt. Kimberly Willis Hold is famous for many books including When Zachary Beaver Came to Town and My Lousiana Sky. She is also the author of the new series called Piper Reed Navy Brat.
We have read the first Piper Reed Navy Brat and we are sure that this series will be very big.
We hope you go to Childrensbookradio.com to check out our past episodes with interview of many other great children's book authors as well a super reviews.
Please support Children's Book Radio by purchasing books from our children's book store and supporting our sponsors.
For more information about this children's book podcast, please contact us via the website at http://childrensbookradion.com

item.description:
